articles.author: Frank Scheck
articles.title: ‘About My Father’ Review: Robert De Niro and Sebastian Maniscalco Headline Limp Culture-Clash Comedy - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The pair play an Italian-American widower and his son in a comedy co-starring Leslie Bibb, Anders Holm and Kim Cattrall.
articles.content: If it’s true that every U.S. senator looks in the mirror and sees a president, it’s even truer that every stand-up comedian does the same and sees a movie star. The latest comic looking to upgrade to… [+4413 chars]
